item.title: Problem with a Command
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you’re going to write a command make sure you check your brackets. Every opening bracket needs a closing one, {}!

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with a Command
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Alright, i want to add a ::hidemod command.
I’ve added a code myself before, but i cant really remember how i did it.

Now i tryed it again
Snippet:
Code:

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("hidemod"); c.playerRights = 5; c.sendMessage("You Sucessfully hidden your crown"); c.sendMessage("Please Log out to see the Changes"); }
No i will not add a if innit (Like this)

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("hidecrown"); if (c.playerRights >=1) c.playerRights = 5; if (c.playerRights >=2) c.playerRights = 6; if (c.playerRights >=3) c.playerRights = 7; c.sendMessage("You Sucessfully hidden your crown"); c.sendMessage("Please Log out to see the Changes"); }

Read full topic
